channel.title: AX2012 on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in AX2012 on Automaly
channel.managingEditor: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
channel.webMaster: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)

item.title: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Update Process
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 update process including hotfixes, cumulative updates, and feature pack installation procedures.

item.title: How to create main menu in Dynamics AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Step-by-step tutorial for creating custom main menus in Dynamics AX 2012 AOT, including menu design and module integration techniques.

item.title: Number sequence farmework overview in Dynamics AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive tutorial on implementing number sequence framework in Dynamics AX 2012 with module creation and X++ development examples.

item.title: Overview delete action in Dynamics AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to delete actions in Dynamics AX 2012 table relations including None, Restricted, Cascade, and Cascade + Restricted options for referential integrity.

item.title: Handle AIF error messages in dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide for handling and managing AIF error messages in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 integration scenarios with practical troubleshooting techniques.

item.title: How to create HTTP adapter port
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Step-by-step guide for creating HTTP adapter ports in Dynamics AX 2012 AIF integration, including configuration and setup procedures.

item.title: Response in AIF custom service class
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to handle and customize response objects in AIF custom service classes for Dynamics AX 2012 integration scenarios.

item.title: AIF Custom response value in Dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to customize AIF response values in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 for sales order creation using C# integration and EntityKeyList handling.

item.title: How to block vendor and send email for notification
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Automated X++ solution to block vendors based on transaction conditions and send email notifications using batch jobs in Dynamics AX 2012.

item.title: Simple summary Keys are in Dynamics AX
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Explanation of database key concepts in Dynamics AX including primary keys, alternate keys, and their role in table relationships.

item.title: AX1004 error in Dynamics AX
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving AX1004 reference assembly errors in Dynamics AX 2012 when moving reports between dev and production environments.

item.title: Recalculate InventSum in Dynamics AX
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Simple X++ code example showing how to recalculate InventSum using InventSumRecalcItem class for inventory management in Dynamics AX 2012.

item.title: Simple summary Keys are in Dynamics AX
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Basic overview of primary keys, alternate keys, and foreign keys in Dynamics AX table design and relational database structure.

item.title: Using Methods in Table Filters & Query Ranges in Dynamics AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to use SysQueryRangeUtil class methods in Dynamics AX 2012 for dynamic date filtering in query ranges and table filters with practical examples.

item.title: Difference between QueryFilter and QueryBuildRange
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn the key differences between QueryFilter and QueryBuildRange classes in Dynamics AX 2012 queries. Understand when conditions are applied in WHERE vs ON clause of OUTER JOIN statements.

item.title: Useful functions to use in AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive collection of useful X++ utility functions for Dynamics AX 2012 including file operations, XML processing, email sending, data encryption, dimension handling, and AOT manipulation. Essential developer toolkit.

item.title: CRUD Purchase Requisition using AIF in Dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete walkthrough for implementing purchase requisition create, read, update, and delete operations using AIF integration in Dynamics AX 2012 R3.

item.title: CRUD Purchase order using AIF in Dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to implementing purchase order CRUD operations using AIF document services in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 with C# code examples.

item.title: Insert, update, Delete order line through AIF In AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to perform CRUD operations on order lines through AIF integration services in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 with detailed implementation examples.

item.title: CRUD Items, products, products master dimension, variants using AIF in Dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete tutorial on creating, reading, updating, and deleting products and variants in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 using AIF services and C# integration.

item.title: Posting cust payment journal using X++ Dynamics AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Step-by-step X++ code examples for programmatically posting customer payment journals in Dynamics AX 2012 using LedgerJournalTable and posting routines.

item.title: The Type system of Dynamics AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 type system covering value types, reference types, memory management, and X++ data structures.

item.title: Types of services in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete overview of Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 service types including document services, custom services, and system services. Learn when to use each service type for AIF integration.

item.title: Microsoft AX 2012 Test Data Transfer Tool
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to using Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Test Data Transfer Tool for migrating production data to development environments. Learn step-by-step installation and usage procedures.

item.title: Create record in DimensionAttributeValueCombination table manually
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: X++ code examples to manually create records in DimensionAttributeValueCombination table for financial dimensions in Dynamics AX 2012. Two different approaches using DimensionServiceProvider and DimensionDefaultingService.

item.title: How to verify active inventory dimensions on an item
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Simple X++ code example to verify which inventory dimensions are active on an item in Dynamics AX 2012. Use InventDimParm and InventDimGroupSetup to check dimension settings.

item.title: Link Type and Join Types in AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to Link Types (Active, Delayed, Passive) and Join Types (InnerJoin, OuterJoin, ExistJoin, NotExistJoin) in Dynamics AX 2012. Learn data source relationships and SQL query patterns.

item.title: How to use operator OR in QueryBuildRange
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to implement OR operator logic in QueryBuildRange for Dynamics AX 2012. Simple method to create multiple range conditions on the same field without complex expressions.

item.title: Caching form into AOS to increase performance for Dynamics AX
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Improve Dynamics AX performance by pre-loading and caching frequently used forms into AOS after server restarts. X++ script to automatically warm up forms and reduce first-load compilation time.

item.title: How to use LIKE operator in QueryBuildRange
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to implement LIKE operator functionality in QueryBuildRange using wildcards in Dynamics AX 2012. Complete X++ example for pattern matching in database queries.

item.title: Set default value for a comboBox in Dynamics AX 2012 with X++
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn different methods to set default values for combobox controls in Dynamics AX 2012 forms using X++ code. Best practices for form initialization, table initValue method, and datasource overrides.

item.title: Web Services on IIS - Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshoot “Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation” error when installing Web Services on IIS for AX 2012. Solution involves configuring proper AOS service account on domain controllers.

item.title: AxBuild.exe for Parallel Compile on AOS
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Fast compilation technique for Dynamics AX 2012 using AxBuild.exe for parallel compilation on AOS server. Complete command-line guide with parameters and log importing process.

item.title: List Page Interaction Class
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn about List Page Interaction Classes in Dynamics AX 2012 that extend SysListPageInteractionBase to control form behavior, button states, and UI logic across multiple forms.

item.title: Execute external database Stored Procedure from X++ code using ODBC connectivity
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to execute stored procedures in external databases from X++ code using ODBC connectivity in Dynamics AX 2012. Complete example with connection setup and query execution.

item.title: Execute Stored Procedure from X++ code
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to execute SQL stored procedures from X++ code in Dynamics AX 2012 using server-side methods with proper SqlStatementExecutePermission and error handling.

item.title: X++ Performance tips
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Essential X++ performance optimization tips for Dynamics AX 2012 including measuring execution time, avoiding if statements in loops, optimizing table methods, and using specialized fast code patterns.

item.title: Create and write to XML file in Dynamics AX
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to create and write XML files in Dynamics AX using X++ code with XmlDocument, XmlElement, and XmlWriter classes. Complete example shows generating XML from table data with attributes and tags.

item.title: What is the difference difference between menu item Display, Output and Action
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Understand the conceptual differences between Display, Output, and Action menu items in Dynamics AX 2012. Learn when to use each type for forms, reports, and database operations in the AOT.

item.title: Understand model store architectural in AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn about AX 2012 model store architecture, layers, and models that replaced AOD files from previous versions. Understand how the model store manages application elements and customizations in the database.

item.title: Architecture overview Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive architectural overview of Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 system components including AOS, client-server communication, model store, Enterprise Portal, security, workflow, and reporting infrastructure. Essential guide for AX 2012 architects and solution developers.
